item.title: All clubs
item.description: Dojo BIT Rue Sonnex 2 1218 Grand Saconnex Training hours Général: Monday 12h15-13h30 Général: Wednesday 12h15-13h30 Général: Friday 12h15-13h30   Dojo Servette Karate kids - Ecole de Cayla Shung Do Kwan Budo Ecole de Cayla 12 rue William-Lescaze 1203 Genève Training hours Enfants: Wednesday 16h30-17h30 Karate general - Ecole de Trembley Shung Do Kwan Budo Ecole de Trembley 14 rue Pestalozzi 1203 Genève Training hours Général: Tuesday 20h00-21h30 Général: Thursday 20h00-21h30   Dojo Collonge-Bellerive Route d'Hermance 101 1245 Collonge-Bellerive Training hours Enfants: Monday 16h30-17h30 Ado-Adultes: Monday 18h00-19h30 Ado-Adultes: Monday 19h30-21h00   Dojo Versoix Karate-Dô Chidokai Versoix Chemin de la Pralay 6 1294 Genthod Training hours Enfants: Friday 17h00-18h00 Général: Friday 18h00-20h00   Location Dojo Cayla Ecole de Cayla, 12 rue William-Lescaze, 1203 Genève    Location Dojo Collonge-Bellerive Route d'Hermance 101, 1245 Collonge-Bellerive   Courtyard entrance.

item.title: Collonge-Bellerive
item.description: Training hours Child: Monday 16h30-17h30 Ado-Adult: Monday 18h00-19h30 Ado-Adult: Monday 19h30-21h00 Fees Child (6 - 12 y/o): CHF 150.- per semester Ado-Adult: CHF 450.- per year 1-month free trial period Simply come to the dojo in sportswear to get started Please present this completed form at the first lesson Registration Please fill in the membership contract and return it at your next lesson Location Dojo Collonge-Bellerive Route d'Hermance 101, 1245 Collonge-Bellerive   Courtyard entrance.

item.title: SDK - Servette

Registration Find out more about registration conditions on the official Shung Do Kwan Budo website.

item.title: Versoix
